alert.note: Alert for Carson; Gray; Hutchinson; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 5:28AM CDT until June 12 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 AM CDT FOR CARSON...SOUTHEASTERN HUTCHINSON...WESTERN GRAY AND SOUTHWESTERN ROBERTS COUNTIES... At 527 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 17 miles north of Skellytown to 4 miles northeast of White Deer to 5 miles northwest of Panhandle, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Pampa, Panhandle, White Deer, Skellytown and Kingsmill. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: These storms are producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
